sentences.english: I think I'll participate in the triathlon with my old, one-speed bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 我想用平时卖东西时用的自行车去参加铁人三项赛。

sentences.english: Exp: I hear you're a triathlete now?
sentences.chinese: 我听说妳是“铁人三项”的一份子了？

sentences.english: A triathlete's stride is critical to his or her running performance.
sentences.chinese: 铁人三项的步伐对于他或她的跑步成绩至关重要。

sentences.english: Put him as the "Agricultural Iron Man."
Hawaii challenges the fittest to survive its Ironman triathlon.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷邀请最合适的选手参赛，以保存其铁人三项赛。

sentences.english: My goal this year is to complete an Olympic-distance triathlon.
sentences.chinese: 我今年的目标是完成一次奥运会距离的铁人三项。

sentences.english: Triathlons are hard because you have to perform back-to-back events.
sentences.chinese: 铁人三项很困难，因为选手要进行连续的项目。

sentences.english: Shanghai Triathlon Club reserves all rights on the explanation of this brochure.
sentences.chinese: 本规程解释权归上海铁人三项运动俱乐部所有。

sentences.english: There are very few people that I can talk to about running or the triathlons.
sentences.chinese: 因为能跟我谈跑步或铁人三项的人实在不多。

sentences.english: There are two moments that stand out about my first Half Ironman.
sentences.chinese: 在我的第一次半程铁人赛中，有两个瞬间值得记住。

sentences.english: You said you're a triathlon player.
sentences.chinese: 你说你是一名铁人三项运动员。

sentences.english: The "Iron Horse" gave his speech between games of a doubleheader against the Senators .
sentences.chinese: 铁人“在与参议员队的双重赛比赛之间发表了演说。

sentences.english: Well, I think the Ironman everybody thinks is kind of crazy.
sentences.chinese: 好，我想每个人都认为铁人是密丰的。

sentences.english: I thellonk I'll participate in the triathlon with my old, one-speed bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 我想用平时卖东西时用的脚踏车去到场铁人三项赛。
大家都叫王进喜“王铁人”。

sentences.english: I competed in the Taupo ironman in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 我在2007年时参加了陶波湖铁人赛。

definition: brave man, willing to risk his life
